import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const StockDisplayer = ({ filteredStocks, setNewQuantity, handleQ }) => { return ( <> {filteredStocks.map((stock, key) => { const {id, imgURL, name, type, quantity, supplier, note} = stock;

List of Stocks

ID Image Name Type Quantity (max 100) Supplier In-stock Note
{id} {name} {type} Current: {quantity <= 5 ? {quantity} : {quantity}} {supplier} {quantity > 0 ? Yes : No} {note}
})} ); } export default StockDisplayer;
